Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish and label it.
The student can draw and label water where the fish lives.
The student can include other plants and animals found in the fish's habitat.
The student can label things that fish need, such as water and food.
The student can show and label how different parts of the habitat help the fish survive.
The student can explain through their drawing how the fish and its environment are a system that works together.
